mapper.update: update kms_a_key set key_value=#{keyValue}, check_value=#{checkValue}, version=${version}, create_by=#{createBy} where key_id=#{keyId}
update kms_a_key set status=${status} where key_id=#{keyId}
mapper.select:
select kak.*, ko.org_name, kt.template_name from kms_a_key kak, kms_org ko, kms_template kt where kt.template_id=kak.template_id and kak.org_id=ko.org_id and kak.status!=5
and (kak.org_id=#{orgId} or kak.org_id='orgRoot')
select count(*) from kms_a_key where org_id='orgRoot'

select kak.*, ko.org_name,ko.org_code, kt.template_name from kms_a_key kak, kms_org ko, kms_template kt where kt.template_id=kak.template_id and kak.org_id=ko.org_id and kak.status!=5 and kak.key_id=#{keyId}
select kak.* from kms_a_key kak left join kms_collection_key kck on kak.org_id=#{orgId} and kak.status=2 and kak.key_id!=kck.key_id and kck.collection_id=#{collectionId}
select kak.* from kms_a_key kak, kms_key_collection kkc, kms_collection_key kck where kak.key_id=kck.key_id and kck.collection_id=kkc.collection_id and kkc.collection_id=#{collectionId}
select kak.* from kms_a_key kak where kak.org_id=#{orgId} and kak.status=2 and kak.key_id not in (select key_id from kms_collection_key where collection_id=#{collectionId})
select count(*) from kms_a_key where template_id=#{templateId}
